title: Café del Mar Bali Afternoon (Half-day)
overview: Experience Ibiza vibes at Café del Mar Bali with its beachfront pool, Mediterranean cuisine, and sunset sessions.

stops.description: Depart for Café del Mar Bali.
Arrive and enjoy the infinity pool and daybeds.
Enjoy Mediterranean-inspired dishes with ocean views.
Relax with signature cocktails and live DJ music as the sun sets.

title: Café del Mar Bali Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of poolside relaxation, Mediterranean dining, and sunset sessions at Café del Mar Bali.

stops.description: Depart for Café del Mar Bali.
Arrive and enjoy the infinity pool, daybeds, and club facilities.
Lunch with Mediterranean flavors and ocean views.
Relax by the pool, enjoy club amenities, or stroll the beach.
Enjoy signature cocktails and live DJ music as the sun sets.
